thread.section_title: The Morning Sun – Mount Pleasant, MI News, Sports, Weather, Things to Do
thread.title: Isabella sentencings for July 29-Aug. 2

author: Staff report
title: Isabella sentencings for July 29-Aug. 2
text:
Misdemeanor sentencings in Isabella County Trial Court:
Nickolas W. Alcaraz, 30, Weidman, unregistered vehicle, $100 fine and costs; use of methamphetamine, $775 fine and costs, 12 months’ probation, 14 days in jail.
Samuel J. Barnett, 35, Clare, no insurance, $325 fine and costs.
Mathaniel Bartell, 24, Lake, no insurance, $325 fine and costs.
Thomas J. Bechtel, 66, Mt. Pleasant, misload, $425 fine and costs.
Jason J. Bowman, 45, Mt. Pleasant, no operator’s license, $225 fine and costs.
Juan D. Cardenas, 22, Saginaw, police officer assault, $75 fine and costs.
Dallas L. Cook, 30, Barryton, allowing driving with a suspended license, $325 fine and costs.
Tara L. Cyphert, 39, Lake, retail fraud, $575 fine and costs, one day in jail.
Thomas E. Davis, 47, Cadillac, jostling, $500 fine and costs, 12 months’ probation, 43 days in jail.
Robert L. Dolan, 44, Blanchard, driving with a suspended license, $325 fine and costs.
Kailee J. Green, 19, East Tawas, operating while visibly impaired-alcohol, $1,050 fine and costs, six months’ probation, 10 days in jail.
Trevor A. Heckard, 35, Weidman, unregistered vehicle, $125 fine and costs; no insurance, $425 fine and costs.
Jessica J. Ikewood, 39, Coleman, operating while visibly impaired, $885 fine and costs, 10 days in jail.
Keith C. Jones, 72, Mt. Pleasant, allowing driving with a suspended license, $325 fine and costs.
Kerry N. Komperda, 59, St. Louis, high blood alcohol content, $805 fine and costs, 12 months’ probation, 10 days in jail; improper gun possession, $150 fine and costs, 12 months’ probation, 10 days in jail.
Naomi P. Masella, 21, St. Clair Shores, furnishing tobacco, $275 fine and costs.
John I. McClenathe, 69, Lake, driving with a suspended license, $350 fine and costs.
Yoslan Nieto-Escobar, 38, Shepherd, more marijuana than allowed by law, $375 fine and costs, 30 days in jail; more marijuana than allowed by law, $200 fine and costs, 30 days in jail.
Brandon D. Nockengost, 28, Weidman, embezzlement greater than $200, $2,271 fine and costs, six months’ probation, 10 days in jail.
Nancy M. O’Conner, 36, Shepherd, fail to stop at property damage accident, $800 fine and costs, six months’ probation, 10 days in jail.
Dagan C. Olson, 29, Shepherd, operating while visibly impaired-alcohol, $625 fine and costs, 12 months’ probation, 30 days in jail.
James R. Parker-Simonye, 41, Sparta, malicious destruction of property less than $200, $725 fine and costs, three months’ probation, 30 days in jail.
Bennie Parker, 61, Mt. Pleasant, operating while visibly impaired, $885 fine and costs, 10 days in jail.
Tomeka A. Rix, 37, Mt. Pleasant, driving with a suspended license second or subsequent, $225 fine and costs; no insurance, $200 fine and costs; no insurance, $325 fine and costs.
Karry B. Saenz, 35, Shepherd, fail to report, $1,591.01 fine and costs.
David J. Salvatore, 19, Warren, tobacco, $125 fine and costs.
Tammy L. Smalley, 59, Rosebush, operating while visibly impaired, $885 fine and costs, 10 days in jail.
David R. Swarthout, 31, Mt. Pleasant, operating while intoxicated, $1,150 fine and costs, six months’ probation, 15 days in jail.
Allia M. Walker, 31, Harrison, operating while visibly impaired, $700 fine and costs, six months’ probation, 10 days in jail.
Seth E. Williamson, 21, Mt. Pleasant, trespassing, $200 fine and costs.
Michael J. Wolthusen, 28, Waterford, disorderly, $300 fine and costs; trespassing, $300 fine and costs.
Emily E. Ziegler, 18, Caro, operating while visibly impaired, $935 fine and costs, six months’ probation, 10 days in jail.
